Kashira:
Yūsen (祐仙)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Story of Priest Roben (Rōbensugi no yurai / 良弁杉由来)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Dances of the Four Seasons (Hanakurabe shiki no kotobuki / 花競四季寿)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway (Tōkai dōchu hizakurige / 東海道中膝栗毛)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Celebration of Housing Starts (Kotobuki hashiradate manzai / 寿柱立万歳)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

Monkey (Gotenjiku / 五天竺)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (Ōmi Genji senjin yakata / 近江源氏先陣館)

The Seven Gods of Fortune (Shichifukujin takara no irifune / 七福神宝の入舩)

The Red Battle Surcoat (Akai jinbaori / 赤い陣羽織)

The Woman's Harakiri at Nagamachi (Nagamachi onna no harakiri / 長町女腹切)
